channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 情報筋ディズニーは3月に北京で300人以上を解雇した（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Disney's Beijing team had access to US user data and the company worried that could be a red flag to Congress; Disney laid off 300+ in Beijing in March  —  Disney's China layoffs led to technical malfunctions, delayed efforts to troubleshoot  —  abruptly laid off more than 300 people …

item.title: 情報筋：スタジオCEOとWGAは9月22日の交渉を合意に至らず終了、WGAは9月23日にAMPTPと会談予定（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
Sources: studio CEOs and the WGA wrapped up their September 22 bargaining session without reaching an agreement; WGA plans to meet the AMPTP on September 23  —  Jobs, Labor & Workplace  —  Writers Guild of America and major studio representatives met Friday for the third

item.title: ファイリングルパート・マードック氏のフォックス社への給与は、2022年の$18.4Mに対し、2023年度は$22.9M、ラクラン・マードック氏は前年並みの$21.7M（The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
Filing: Rupert Murdoch's Fox Corp. pay package was $22.9M in the fiscal year 2023, compared to $18.4M in 2022, while Lachlan Murdoch received $21.7M, flat YoY  —  The company unveiled compensation packages for the moguls for the latest fiscal year.  —  Rupert Murdoch and son Lachlan received …

item.title: 中国の#MeToo運動を取材したジャーナリストのソフィア・ホァン・シュエチンと労働活動家のワン・ジェンビンが、中国の裁判所で国家転覆罪の裁判を受ける（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Sophia Huang Xueqin, a journalist who covered China's #MeToo movement, and Wang Jianbing, a labor activist, stand trial on subversion charges in a Chinese court  —  Huang Xueqin, the journalist, and Wang Jianbing, a labor activist, have been accused of inciting subversion as the authorities expand a campaign to quash dissent.

item.title: ロシアの主要国営テレビ局「ロシヤ24」は、「週末に」タッカー・カールソンの番組の広告を流しているが、カールソンはロシアのテレビ番組での司会を否定している（Max Seddon/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Max Seddon / Financial Times:
Russia's flagship state news TV channel, Rossiya 24, is running ads for a Tucker Carlson show “at the weekend”, but Carlson denies hosting a show on Russian TV  —  Rightwing former Fox News presenter said he was unaware of the ‘absurd’ claim  —  Russia's flagship state news channel …

item.title: ドキュメンタリー映画監督ケン・バーンズは、ProPublicaがデビッド・コッチと並んだ2人の写真を掲載した後、クラレンス・トーマス司法長官と距離を置こうとしている（Caitlin Huston/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Caitlin Huston / The Hollywood Reporter:
Documentary filmmaker Ken Burns tries to distance himself from SCOTUS Justice Clarence Thomas after ProPublica published a photo of the two alongside David Koch  —  The documentary filmmaker says he has not had contact with Thomas beyond taking a photo.  —  Documentary filmmaker Ken Burns …

item.title: アメリカの公立学校では、2022年7月1日から2023年6月31日までに3362冊の図書が禁止され、前年度より33％増加、フロリダの学校では禁止図書の40％以上を占める（PENアメリカ）
item.description:
PEN America:
US public schools had 3,362 book bans from July 1, 2022, to June 31, 2023, up 33% from the previous school year; Florida schools accounted for 40%+ of the bans  —  Banned in the USA: The Mounting Pressure to Censor  —  Introduction  —  The freedom to read is under assault in the United States …

item.title: メモ：スナップ米州社長ロブ・ウィルクが2023年3月入社で退社、後任はメタ社で10年以上働いた後スナップに入社したパトリック・ハリス（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Memo: Snap President of Americas Rob Wilk leaves, after joining the company in March 2023, replaced by Patrick Harris, who joined Snap after 10+ years at Meta  —  Snap Inc. has promoted former Meta executive Patrick Harris to the position of President of Americas, overseeing sales …

item.title: FTが海外読者向けに電子ペーパーアプリをデビュー；ABC：FTデジタル版の8月の平均発行部数は1万6343部、うち81％が英国外（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The FT debuts an e-paper app for international readers; ABC: the FT digital edition had a 16,343 average circulation in August, of which 81% was outside the UK  —  The FT's e-paper has evolved since it first launched on desktop in 2015.  —  The Financial Times has launched an app …

item.title: アップルのサービス担当上級副社長エディ・キューは、いかにしてスポーツのライブストリーミングへの参入を主導し、MLSとの契約を利用してスポーツの消費方法の再構築を試みているのか（Sam Schube/GQ）
item.description:
Sam Schube / GQ:
How Apple SVP of Services Eddy Cue led the company's push into live sports streaming and is using its MLS deal to test reshaping how sports are consumed  —  Longtime Apple executive Eddy Cue happens to be an enormous sports fan.  And with Apple entering the wild west of broadcasting live sports …

item.title: アマゾン、2024年初頭から米国、英国、ドイツ、カナダでプライム・ビデオに限定広告を流す計画、米国では広告を回避するために月額2.99ドルの追加料金を徴収（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Amazon plans to run limited ads on Prime Video in the US, the UK, Germany, and Canada starting in early 2024, charging $2.99/month extra in the US to avoid ads  —  - Prime Video will offer a more expensive ad-free option  — Streamers want to increase revenue as production costs soar

item.title: スタジオCEOは9月21日にもWGAとのマラソン交渉に出席、WGAとスタジオの協議は9月22日に再開された（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
Studio CEOs attended another marathon bargaining session with the WGA on September 21; talks between the WGA and studios resumed on September 22  —  Jobs, Labor & Workplace  —  The Writers Guild of America and major studios  —  held a marathon bargaining session Thursday …

item.title: WGAとのマラソン交渉でCEOが遅くまで残る（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
CEOs Stay Late in Marathon Bargaining Session With WGA  —  Four Hollywood CEOs returned to the bargaining table Thursday for a second day of talks with the Writers Guild of America, as the industry looked for signs of progress toward a deal that would end the 143-day strike.

item.title: 父親ほどあからさまに政治的でなく、訴訟を乗り越えてフォックスを率い、Tubiの買収などいくつかの成功を収めているラクラン・マードックのプロフィール（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
A profile of Lachlan Murdoch, who is less overtly political than his father, has led Fox through lawsuits, and has some proven successes, such as acquiring Tubi  —  He solidified his rise to the top of his father's media empire on Thursday.  —  Lachlan Murdoch's path to succession has been rocky at times …

item.title: マイケル・ウルフ著『The Fall』より抜粋：第1章では、ルパート・マードックの死亡記事を想像している。
item.description:
Michael Wolff / The Ankler:
Excerpt from Michael Wolff's The Fall: the first chapter imagines an eventual Rupert Murdoch obituary that details his life and career at Fox Corp and News Corp  —  The mogul's ‘obituary’ opens the buzzy upcoming book, ‘The End: The Fall of Fox News and the Murdoch Dynasty’
